name: Rogue Sentry
description:
Rogue Sentry is a difficult twin-stick adventure shoot-em-up about a sentry droid who turns rogue to save humanity.

Run and gun your way through a deadly fortress, riddled with gun and laser wielding machines, as you infiltrate the prisons and escape with the last humans alive in this AI-takeover apocalypse.

        
  • ~2h playthrough
  • Epic finale
  • Multiple endings
  • Alternate game modes
  • C64/Amiga-inspired soundtrack
  • 1-bit art style

Sentry droid, you are humanity's last hope. Can you reverse the apocalypse, save the prisoners, and escape the fortress before it's too late? Your mission is simple: Save humanity.

Secrets and surprises await those who persist.
